summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2667, for the improvement of 32nd Avenue Northwest from West 71st Street to West 85th Street, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing mains together with such appurtenances as may be necessary for proper fire protection of said district under Ordinance No. 31378 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
